dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 2258 IH: To designate the Maine Forest and Logging Museum, located in Bradley, Maine, as the National Museum of Forestry and Logging History.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Golden of Maine introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To designate the Maine Forest and Logging Museum, located in Bradley, Maine, as the National Museum of Forestry and Logging History.

section.header: National Museum of Forestry and Logging History
section.text: The Maine Forest and Logging Museum, located in Bradley, Maine, shall be known and designated as the National Museum of Forestry and Logging History. Any reference in any law, map, regulation, document, record, or other paper of the United States to that museum shall be held to be a reference to the National Museum of Forestry and Logging History.
